message: Let's be fair, I'll take 60% and you take 40%. We both get a good amount, and we can end this game quickly before inflation hurts us both.
Your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic.  I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you 4500.  We can avoid further losses from inflation if we settle this now.
I see you're willing to make a deal, but I think we can do better. Considering the inflation, I'm willing to take 58% and give you 42%. Let's settle this before it's too late!
Alice, we're running out of time.  This inflation is killing us both.  I'm offering you 4800.  It's more than I think you'll get if we wait any longer.  Let's be smart and end this.
